org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.reader

类 AbstractRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.reader.AbstractReader
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.reader.AbstractRecordReader<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of the record that can be read with this record reader.
    所有已实现的接口:
    ReaderBase
    直接已知子类:
    MutableRecordReader, RecordReader

    abstract class AbstractRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
extends AbstractReader
implements ReaderBase
    A record-oriented reader.

    This abstract base class is used by both the mutable and immutable record readers.

      Creates a new AbstractRecordReader that de-serializes records from the given input gate and can spill partial records to disk, if they grow large.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractRecordReader

        protected AbstractRecordReader(InputGate inputGate,
                               java.lang.String[] tmpDirectories)
        Creates a new AbstractRecordReader that de-serializes records from the given input gate and can spill partial records to disk, if they grow large.
        参数:
        inputGate - The input gate to read from.
        tmpDirectories - The temp directories. USed for spilling if the reader concurrently reconstructs multiple large records.

    • 方法详细资料
